mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEMP_GROUP SELECT G.GROUP_ID FROM TB_GROUP G WHERE G.GROUP_STATUS = 1 START WITH G.GROUP_ID = 1441 CONNECT BY PRIOR G.GROUP_ID = G.SUPER_ID
mapper.select: SELECT C.* FROM TB_GROUP_CARD_LINK GC, TB_USER_CARD C, TEMP_GROUP2 G WHERE GC.GROUP_ID = G.GROUP_ID AND GC.CARD_ID = C.CARD_ID AND GC.LINK_STATUS = 1 AND C.CARD_STATUS = 1 AND ROWNUM < 20
mapper.insert: UPDATE TEST0230 SET CARD_NAME = 'HELLO' WHERE CARD_ID = 190
